children.text: ity etair guṇayukto [guṇair yukto] bhagavato mahādevasya mahāgaṇapatir bhavati //
ity etair guṇa-yukto [guṇair yukto] bhagavato mahā-devasya mahā-gaṇa-patir bhavati //
ubhayaṃ tu rudre devāḥ pitaraś ca //
ubhayaṃ tu rudre devāḥ pitaraś ca //
vāmadevāya namo jyeṣṭhāya namo rudrāya namaḥ //
vāma-devāya namo jyeṣṭhāya namo rudrāya namaḥ //
unmatto mūḍha ity evaṃ manyante itare janāḥ //
unmatto mūḍha ity evaṃ manyante itare janāḥ //
asanmāno hi yantrāṇāṃ sarveṣām uttamaḥ smṛtaḥ //
asan-māno hi yantrāṇāṃ sarveṣām uttamaḥ smṛtaḥ //
indro vā agre asureṣu pāśupatam acarat //
indro vā agre asureṣu pāśupatam acarat //
āpo va āpi yathā-kālam aśnīyād anupūrvaśaḥ //
siddhayogī na lipyate karmaṇā pātakena vā //
siddha-yogī na lipyate karmaṇā pātakena vā //
